title: Payment processor merchant statements (Stripe, PayPal, Square)
dataVerified: Merchant name, transaction volume, fees, payouts, chargebacks
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Statement status (final). Link to processor system (merchants and tax authorities, requires authentication)
rationale: Tamper-evident payout records. Domain binding verifies processor. Tax reporting accuracy (1099-K). Chargeback documentation. Merchant disputes. Fee transparency. Audit trail for tax authorities.
